short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the real score of the products using a Weighted Rating Algorithm

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Imagine you have two products:
200 reviews with a rating of 4.3
180 reviews with a rating of 4.5

Which one should you choose?

Well, Math can help us here!
Amazon Ratings Enhancer, is an extension we developed exactly for this need. This extension Calculates a meaningful score by using a Weighted Rating With Quadratic And Review Count Penalty algorithm, designed to help you with deciding which product is the best!

The score will be shown in the search page and product page, with option to disable any of those in the extension popup

This is out first version, hope u enjoy and don't forget to send us feedback!

NB: THIS EXTENSION DOES NOT COLLECT ANY SORT OF DATA
